title: Leech

fields.name: Need To Feed (Passive):
fields.value:
You have a hunger meter that ranges from 0 to 3. It increases by 1 at the end of each Night if you do nothing. The effects are as follows
0 (Sated): Your Defense Power is 1.5x.
1 (Hungry): No effect. Your Defense Power is 1.0x.
2 (Starving): You receive a 5% penalty in Evenings, your Defense Power is 0.75x.
3 (Wasted Away): You die.

You start at 1 (Hungry).

fields.name: The Feeding:
fields.value: Attack a player. If you kill them, your hunger decreases by 1 instead of increasing by 1 tonight. Players killed by this ability cannot be targeted by abilities in following phases.

fields.name: Devour Corpse (x0, Charge 100%):
fields.value: Target a player who died in the last Night, Day, or Evening. You will devour their body, making them  untargetable. Additionally, your Hunger will stay the same tonight instead of increasing by 1.
